definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: Nu 32:3 (+ [[דִּיבוֹן]], etc.)—mod. Aṭṭarûs, c. 8 miles NNW. from Dibon—built by Gad Nu 32:34 (+ ´[[ד]], [[עֲרׂעֵר]], and also)

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[עַטְרׂת שׁוֹפָן]] v:Nu 32:35 (Sam. [[שפים]] ´[[ע]], v. Di; site unknown).
W. of Jordan, conject. as to sites v. in Di Buhl:Geogr. 172:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: on border between Ephr. and Benj. Jos 16:2, = [[עַטְרוֹת]] [[אַדָּר]] v:Jos 16:5, Jos 18:13.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: on E. border of Ephr. Jos 16:7.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[עַטְרוֹת בֵּית יוֹאָב]] 1Ch 2:54 in Judah; a ‘ son ’ of Salma (+ Bethlehem, al.).
